### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    requirement_name TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_officers (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    action TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    officer_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (officer_id) REFERENCES compliance_officers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
    doc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name TEXT,
    document_type TEXT,
    document_url TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET compliance_status = true WHERE requirement_name = 'ISO 9001'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE regulatory_requirements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_id INT,
  document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  document_link TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  requirement_id INT,
  log_date DATE,
  log_entry TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES regulatory_requirements(id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_personnel (
  personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  personnel_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  personnel_role VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_audit (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  audit_date DATE,
  findings TEXT,
  recommendation TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
